text:
e="preserve">Eileen Pollock (18 May 1947 – 19 December 2020) was a Northern Irish actress. She was known for her role as Lilo Lil in television series "Bread". Pollock was born in Belfast, Northern Ireland. Her career lasted from 1982 until her retirement in 2019.
Pollock died on 19 December 2020 in London at the age of 73.
